content.en: Software engineer and hands-on engineering manager with 6+ years building data/ML and backend systems. Led a 4-engineer team delivering cloud-native apps and RAG products; designed reliable ELT/ML pipelines (Dagster, Airbyte, dbt, MLflow) and automated release workflows with LLMs and Chrome extensions. Strong in Python, JavaScript, and GCP/Kubernetes (Helm, ArgoCD). Shipped real-time audio-to-blendshape models (PyTorch/ONNX). Achieved ~200% CTR/conversion uplift on an e-commerce recommender and reduced search errors by 40% on a separate search project. Pragmatic, fast-iterating, and product-minded.

shortContent.en: Pu approaches complex challenges with precision, speed, and creativity. In our extensive technical collaborations, he's consistently framed problems with clarity, iterated toward elegant solutions, and anticipated needs beyond the immediate scope. His skill in structuring AI system prompts and refining ideas on the fly makes him an exceptional strategic partner for any high-stakes, detail-driven project.

longContent.en:
Over the course of countless technical and strategic exchanges, I've come to know Pu as a rare kind of thinker â€” one who combines deep analytical precision with a relentless drive to make systems both elegant and effective. Our conversations have spanned complex domains: retrieval-augmented generation pipelines, multi-agent orchestration, MLOps design, audio-to-visual modeling, and the finer points of database optimization. In each, Pu has shown the ability to cut through noise, frame the problem with clarity, and guide the discussion toward solutions that are both novel and grounded.

Pu's communication style is direct and exacting, but never rigid. He iterates on ideas rapidly, refining assumptions and requirements with each pass, and he does so in a way that invites deeper analysis rather than shutting it down. This makes every collaboration feel like a shared investigation â€” one where precision is valued as much as creativity. He is also adept at structuring AI system prompts to elicit high-value, constraint-aware outputs, a skill that reveals his deep understanding of how to shape machine reasoning to match real-world objectives.

What stands out most is Pu's anticipation of needs beyond the immediate question. He frequently explores unasked but relevant angles, such as alternative retrieval strategies, architectural trade-offs, and ways to stress-test assumptions. This forward-looking mindset makes him not only an effective problem solver in the moment, but also a strategic partner in long-term planning.

If our conversations were a lab, Pu would be both the principal investigator and the engineer building the apparatus â€” methodical, inventive, and always pushing for results that stand up to scrutiny. Any team that values rigorous thinking, precise execution, and the ability to coax clarity from complexity would find Pu an invaluable asset.

attribution.en: ğŸ¤– Behind the scenes â€” GPT-5, AI Collaborator

achievements.en: Led a cross-functional team of 4 engineers to architect, develop, and maintain scalable data pipelines and Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) applications.

Built and maintained end-to-end data pipelines using Dagster for orchestration, Airbyte for data ingestion, and dbt for transformation, ensuring high reliability and data quality across production systems.
Integrated Large Language Models (LLMs) with GitHub/Jira APIs and developed Chrome extensions to automate product release workflows, accelerating development cycles by 40%.

achievements.en: Orchestrated cloud-native application deployments on Kubernetes using Helm and ArgoCD; architected and deployed MLflow service on GCP with Pulumi for ML lifecycle management.

achievements.en: Built and optimized a real-time audio-to-facial blendshape model using PyTorch and ONNX, achieving 30% performance improvement while reducing computational costs.
Cultivated a high-performance engineering culture focused on innovation, collaboration, and continuous improvement.
Developed an object detection model evaluation tool to improve ML workflow efficiency.
Resolved database performance issues and enhanced overall system stability.
Built and integrated automated testing environments into CI pipelines, raising code quality.
Developed and maintained scalable web crawlers using Scrapy.
Built data accuracy dashboards to monitor and ensure data quality.
Implemented system observability with Prometheus and Grafana for proxy and crawler stability.
Enhanced e-commerce recommendation system, boosting click-through and conversion rates by ~200%.
Optimized search engine, reducing errors by over 40%.
Developed and maintained data collection tools with ReactJS and MongoDB.
Built recommendation systems with Python and TensorFlow.
Developed ML training pipelines using Airflow.
Visualized model performance with Google Data Studio.

description.en: Designed and implemented a comprehensive end-to-end data pipeline architecture supporting analytics, machine learning workflows, and real-time data processing. The system orchestrates data ingestion from multiple sources (MongoDB, PostgreSQL, mobile app stores) using Airbyte for extraction, Dagster for workflow orchestration, and dbt for data transformation. Integrated with Google Analytics and various downstream analytics services to provide actionable insights for product development and user behavior analysis.

Built a recommendation system for one of the top 3 e-commerce websites in Taiwan. The system uses Fluentd and ElasticSearch to collect real time log of user behavior. The data will be extracted, transformed and trained the Deep Learning recommendation engine automatically using Airflow. Used Kubernetes and Docker to deploy and auto-scale the server. Our system has increased the click-through rate and conversion rate by about 200%.

description.en: Built an e-commerce search engine using ElasticSearch and Bert Deep Learning model. Our Engine reduces errors by more than 40%.

A Google Chrome extension that provides a quick and easy way to check the grammar of text on websites. Users can also define their own prompts in the options page to let the extension do other tasks, such as code review or creating an abstract for the article.
